22 #include <cmath>
23 
24 #include "mutation++.h"
25 #include "TestMacros.h"
26 #include <catch.hpp>
27 
28 using namespace Mutation;
29 using namespace Catch;
30 
31 
32 TEST_CASE(
33  "Bug #94 fix: 1 species equilibrium cp doesn't NaN",
34  "[bugs][thermodynamics]"
35 )
36 {
37  MixtureOptions opts;
38  opts.setSpeciesDescriptor("NH3");
39  opts.setStateModel("Equil");
40  Mixture mix(opts);
41 
42  double T = 1548;
43  double P = 1106507.818257603;
44  mix.setState(&P, &P, 1);
45 
46  double cp_mole = mix.mixtureEquilibriumCpMole();
47  CHECK(!std::isnan(cp_mole));
48 
49  double cp_mass = mix.mixtureEquilibriumCpMass();
50  CHECK(!std::isnan(cp_mass));
51 
52  double cp_NH3;
53  mix.speciesCpOverR(&cp_NH3);
54  CHECK(cp_mole == cp_NH3 * RU);
55  CHECK(cp_mass == cp_NH3 * RU / mix.speciesMw(0));
56 }
